63.eng-name: Merits of the Helpers in Madinah (Ansaar)

hadiths.text: Narrated Anas bin Malik:The Prophet (ﷺ) said to Ubai, "Allah has ordered me to recite to you: 'Those who disbelieve (Surat-al- Bayina 98).' " Ubai said, "Has He mentioned my name?" The Prophet (ﷺ) said, "Yes." On hearing this, Ubai started weeping

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنَاقِبُ أُبَىِّ بْنِ كَعْبٍ رضى الله عنه
chapter.eng-name: The virtues of Ubayy bin Ka’b
